groups.title: General dentistry
groups.description: Check-ups, gum care, fillings, crowns, and dentures to keep everyday oral health steady.

groups.title: Dental implants
groups.description: Implant planning, placement, grafting, and restoration with guided follow-up.

groups.title: Cosmetic dentistry
groups.description: Whitening, bonding, veneers, and smile design planned for conservative aesthetics.

groups.title: Orthodontics & retainers
groups.description: Aligners, fixed braces, and retainers with paced reviews to keep movements safe.

groups.title: Emergency dentistry
groups.description: Rapid assessments for pain, infection, swelling, or trauma with same-day advice.

groups.title: Oral surgery
groups.description: Planned extractions and oral surgery with clear aftercare and review points.

groups.title: Guards, splints & mouthguards
groups.description: Custom splints and sports guards that protect teeth from clenching or impacts.

groups.title: Digital & 3D dentistry
groups.description: CBCT scanning, digital planning, and 3D printing to guide precise treatment steps.

groups.title: Sedation & nervous patients
groups.description: Comfort pathways with sedation options and gentle numbing for anxious patients.

groups.title: Facial therapeutics & facial aesthetics
groups.description: Therapeutic injectables, TMJ comfort care, and aesthetic refinements for the face.
